definitions.text: to cause someone to lose clear vision, especially from intense light
examples: She was dazzled by the bright headlights

definitions.text: overcome as with astonishment or disbelief
in a state of mental numbness especially as resulting from shock
examples: he had a dazed expression on his face
lay semiconscious, stunned (or stupefied) by the blow

definitions.text: stunned or confused and slow to react (as from blows or drunkenness or exhaustion)
